data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Yalin, Zhang, Xinmin, Wei, Cong (2009): Review of the leafhopper genus Striatanus Li & Wang (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Evacanthinae) with description of one new species from China. Zootaxa 2292: 49-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191443
